text: Arau ami sihamtara pichate'i mara'iyamara putra ichaka praerana karaichilo, tara sanmukhata ta'oraatara paraa yi arasista achila tara satyata pratipannakarairaupe. Ami taka injila pradana karaichilo, tata ache hidayata arau jyoti, arau seya achila tara sanmukhata arasista ta'oraatara satyata pratipannakarai arau muttakbisakalara babe hidayata arau upadesasbaraupa
